name: Zara/Krish/Yasaswini
greetingText: You are the most amazing online sister I know
wishText: May the algorithms always be in your favor! 😉
text1: It's your special day in the virtual world!!! 😀
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to experience it again.
